description:
Standard International Trade Classification (SITC),
SITC (1-digit codes): Foreign trade

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
51000 Foreign trade

Definition:
The Standard International Trade Classification (SITC) forms
the basis for classifying goods in foreign trade statistics.
It differs from the Harmonised System for describing and
coding goods and the Combined Nomenclature only in that it
provides a higher aggregation of commodity groups and a
structure that is clearly based on statistical requirements.

name: SITC (1-digit codes): Foreign trade
